name: Paper Pilot (itch) (ChurroGelato)
description:
Paper Pilot is an arcade inspired paper plane flight simulator.

Controls:

A - Rotate Plane counterclockwise:

D - Rotate Plane clockwise

Go through fans to increase your speed and pop the baloons for an increase in score multiplier!

This game was developed in only four days for "Weekly Game Jam 167", thank you for playing!
